review:
My wife was having urinary inconsistency. The urge for urination was more. Initially, in Kolhapur, it was diagnosed as urinary tract infection. And she was dumped with heavy antibiotics. Though it as subsided, it continued after some gamp. When we visited, Dr.Lalitha mam, it was detected that in fact it is not Urinary tract infection it is slippery of uterus. Thank you Mam for rightly diagnosing. We thought that surgery may be needed. She assured that no surgery is needed. Only with the help of medication, she had cured and now my wife is healthy and got rid of the problem. Big thanks to Dr. Lalitha mam. In fact, not only my wife, the entire family is grateful to you mam.

D.S. Gururaj, IRS, Asst.Commissioner of Income Tax, Karimnagar.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: i have visited the doctor to show my wife for bladder endometriosys.  she has suffered for more years and we visited so many doctors and spend money only for tests and get no results.  but after consulting Dr.lalitha mam we get right direction and good treatment.  she is an ultimate doctor for urogynic problems.  i observed so many doctors saying that they are also urogynacologists but only Dr.Lalitha madam is the right person *** **** **********  ** **** ***** **** *** **** ********* *** ********** ********

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Appointment slots open were 11:15 and 11:45 AM
We chose 11:45 and have been at the clinic on time but had to wait till 12:45 for the doc to arrive.. no respect for time..

During wait time after doctor was in staff asked us to hold our 18month in the lobby and not let him make any noise.. it does not make sense if anyone expects a toddle to keep his mouth shut.. during appointment you should specify that toddlers are not allowed insted.* ***** ***** ****** **** *** ******** ** ******** *** ******** *** ** *** ***** **********
Consultation fee was 1000 which is fart high *** * ****** ******** ** * ***** ********* ******** *** ****** **** **** ******
Finally doc called us in and didn’t even speak much directly wrote a cystoscope test ans asked to meet nurse.

Nurs madam is busier that the doc who made us wait for 10 more min and came and just said price is 15000/- come prepared.

Haven’t heard 15000/- being charged for a cystoscope in a clinic.. my son had to undergoe a cystoscope ** ******* ***** ****** ** ****** *** ********* ** *** ******* *** *** **** *** *****
*** ****** ** *** **** ***** **** **** ******* *** ******** ****** **** *** *****

Today, I have took an appointment for my Mother with Dr Lalitha Garu and The way she behaved is contradicting to the Degree she earned. She does not have basic thumb rule how to behave with the 50+ year old patient. My Mother because of her weakness she tried to hold the Dr Hand and Dr Lalitha garu replied saying "dont you know you should not touch me." She was rude not only with my parents but with the staff as well. We went there with lot of hope but she is not a mood to listen to the patient completely. I am not sure with what mood she started her day but this is absolutely NOT acceptable. If this happened to a wife of deputy director, i am wondering what could be the experience of a lay man.

The doctor was very impatient. *** ***** **** ** ******* *** *** **** * ********* ******* **** * ****** ******** ************ She gave medicines for an infection and asked to get a USG done. The USG showed early PCOS but she said the pain was due to infection and gave antibiotics. The next time we went for review since the pain had not subsided, She spoke very rudely and said I can't do anything about it. She did a physical examination only upon requesting her to do one. She was asking questions to the patient very rudely and seemed to take offense on being questioned about the cause of the pain or if the patient elaborated on her symptoms. The staff at the hospital is also rude. She also shouts at her staff in front of the patients and seems to treat patients with that pent up anger.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
****** ** **** ***** she is not even listening to what patient is saying. she is not even examining the patient.. she is just starting writing medicines ******** ** **** *** ***** **********
very bad experience... very high waiting  time *** *** ***********


very much unsatisfied with the doctor and treatment

This was an utterly bad bad experience. 
1) Practo showed consultation fee as 500, doctor charged 700.
2) the tests suggested by doctor has got nothing to do with my problem. Infact they charged 1000 for that test.
3) medicine prescribed by doctor has no relevance to the symptoms explained. 

I will never recommend to anyone. Its a loss of money* **** *** ****** ***** ********** *** ***** ***** **************
The requested doctor was not available and no update was received ok this regard. I chose the doctor avail at the moment and her advice didnt seem credible.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Happy with the way she took time to understand my case history and suggesting the treatment accordingly.
Doctor is very good and good treatment give.when ever we go she is very friendly and avoided operation *** ***** ** ********* *****For that I am thankful to her.

review: Nice doctor, explained the actual problem. Clinic Staff is very friendly and response also appreciated.. thanks Doctor & staff for the positive response.. let us go through the medication.. hoping for the best.

review: ********* **  *********   ***  no word to say about madam  because every acccpet  she is super  as per the treatment
We took appointment fort mothersake.She is patient and understanding. She suggested for surgery after conducting a test.
She was nice and patient and guided us well. Does not seem to be commercial.
She was very patient and listened to all my problems. She also gave guidance for future health and her medications are such a relief to me.
A very polite ,soft spoken doctor.empathetic towards patients problems.thoroughly explained the treatment options

Dr. Lalitha mam is very gud doctor and solved my problem in a day with quick solution.. Iam thankful to her. Good staff nd clean rooms in century hospital. I would like  to recommend my friends and family members.
